<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sickening Bite](/Feats.aspx?ID=3510) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off. When you critically hit a creature with your jaws, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). This is a disease effect.

 If you are satiated, you can end your satiation to make the target sickened 1 on a regular hit instead.
name: Sickening Bite
